content: across for 80 row or until desired length is achieved row 191 1 single_crochet in first chain space chain 1 single_crochet decrease ch1 *chain 1 1 single_crochet in chain space 1* repeat to the end of the row chain 2 turn 13sc row 192-200 *1 single_crochet in chain space chain 1* repeat to the end of the row chain 2 turn 13sc continue repeating row 191-200 until you have a total of 1 single_crochet this is worked in increments of 9 row 1 decrease row followed by 8 row modified i-cord border optional chain 2 working in the back loops of the chain insert hook into 2nd chain from hook yo and pull up a loop 2 loops on hook anchor modified i-cord to the first row end *insert hook into the next row end yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook drag the loops to the opposite end of the crochet hook using another crochet hook insert the 2nd hook into the first loop yo pull up a loop then move the loop off of 1st hook insert the 2nd hook into the final two loops yo pull up a loop then move the two last loops off the 1st hook * repeat in every row until you get to the other end/corner
